messages.subject: unschooling and books
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/19/02 1:13:17 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/19/02 1:13:17 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Hey, I'm gonna have to use this one! I never quite thought about it
that way. Problem is, dh might decide to turn the tables on me and
use the same excuse to fill the garage with power tools!!<LOL> >>

But power tools are SO useful!! I love power tools. I shop with dh for new
tools and get all excited when I find one with great features (like that
adjustable compound miter saw I've been drooling over :).

The book issue drives dh batty though.
He bought me "Going Home" by Thich Nhat Hanh a couple nights ago, and when I
begged for it he said "You're supposed to be getting RID of books, not
getting MORE" in an exasperated tone. I asked him since when??!!
He bought it anyway. :)

Ren
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
And remember,
"A life lived in fear is a life half lived"
